author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: FBI Director Kash Patel said the bureau is joining local law enforcement in investigating a “targeted terror attack” in Boulder, Colo., on Sunday afternoon. title: FBI investigating attack in Boulder

description: Sen. description: Senate Republicans will take control of the party’s mammoth tax and domestic policy bill when they return to Washington on Monday — and seek to win over a diverse group of GOP lawmakers agitating for changes to the legislation. description: The Securities and Exchange Commission can help level the playing field by modernizing outdated rules and expanding access to private markets, allowing more Americans to build wealth.

author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday touted the “absolutely brilliant result” of the large-scale drone attack on Russian strategic bombers. “Head of the Security Service of Ukraine Vasyl Maliuk delivered a report regarding today’s operation. author: Sarah Fortinsky
description: The Security Service of Ukraine oversaw a drone operation on Sunday that struck dozens of Russia’s strategic bombers just ahead of planned peace talks in Istanbul. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky confirmed the “absolutely brilliant” outcome of the attack, which he described as “our most long-range operation” to date. Zelensky said the attack had been in...
title: Ukraine says it hit more than 40 Russian bombers in drone attack

description: Fires burning in Canada could bring smoky, hazy skies to parts of the U.S. on Monday.
title: These states could see smoky, hazy skies Monday due to Canadian wildfires

description: Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.) said Sunday that Sen. title: Federal judge halts Trump admin from ending protected status for some Venezuelans
